definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: The host Lee Sheung Ching learnt to cook Vietnamese spring rolls.
sentences.chinese: 主持李尚正向當地廚師賜教，學煑越式春捲。

definition: to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
maltose syrup/molasses/heavy (eyelids)/drowsy-eyed/listless/(of dough, candy etc) to soften/to become soft and sticky
operculum (Latin: little lid)/a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
